meanings.sent1: She eagerly awaits her birthday party.

meanings.definition: To be in store for; be imminent.
meanings.sent1: Dark clouds gather, signaling a storm awaits.
meanings.sent2: Success awaits those who work hard and persevere.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party awaits the unsuspecting birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: Adventure awaits at every turn for the brave explorer.
meanings.sent5: The unknown future awaits us all, full of possibilities and challenges.
